author: By MARIA CHENG AP Medical Writer
title: Europe's hospitals among the best but can't handle pandemic
description: LONDON (AP) — As increasing numbers of European hospitals buckle under the strain of tens of thousands of coronavirus patients, the crisis has exposed a surprising paradox: Some of the world’s best health systems are remarkably ill-equipped to handle a…
content: LONDON (AP) As increasing numbers of European hospitals buckle under the strain of tens of thousands of coronavirus patients, the crisis has exposed a surprising paradox: Some of the worlds best health systems are remarkably ill-equipped to handle a pandemic.… [+6206 chars]
